item.title: Attack
item.description: [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/hands_held_high.md#words-on-loose-leaf-sheet-complete-comin-vyl-wnanory|Breathing each other’s lives]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/hands_held_high.md#words-on-loose-leaf-sheet-complete-comin-vyl-wnanory|Holding this in mind]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/hands_held_high.md#words-on-loose-leaf-sheet-complete-comin-vyl-wnanory|That if we fall, we all fall]] [[songs/l/linkin_park/minutes_to_midnight/hands_held_high.md#words-on-loose-leaf-sheet-complete-comin-vyl-wnanory|And we fall alone]] [[songs/a/avenged_sevenfold/nightmare/tonight_the_world_dies.

item.title: Dreaming
item.description: [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/the_last_sunset/break.md#i-see-all-i-can-see-vyl-wnanory|For today, we will take the body parts]] [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/the_last_sunset/break.md#i-see-all-i-can-see-vyl-wnanory|And put them on the wall]] [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/the_last_sunset/break.md#i-see-all-i-can-see-vyl-wnanory|For treated indigenously, digenously]] [[songs/b/breakdown_of_sanity/the_last_sunset/break.md#i-see-all-i-can-see-vyl-wnanory|Human right is private blue chip, pry]] [[songs/t/the_ghost_inside/get_what_you_give/thirty_three.

item.title: Hypnotize
